body: 好的我的胃有點痛，請謹慎服用
no bad ending for those fuckers????? no????

I cannot fap to this sht, because I know there are real monsters in society that would do this kind of sht. This artist always manages to portray the dark twisted side of humans and its disturbing the fuck out of me.

quote her words:
"Why you guy not just die?"

as for artistic point of view,this manga sure is good,tho it is more about damaging her and make her suffering,but the artist successfully bring it into the image that is memorable and hard to forgotten, it is a 9/10 manga,but I will think more to suggest to others.

in another part of story her kind finally let go of it and admit the fate,despite the mind is twisted,the soul still are there make the fxxk for everyone she touchs,and these beast just tink it is she deserved? I am already feels guilty for stained her that she is already better than everyone I ever met,and she just got that bad ending is not fair.

so a loli just dedicated herself, work ass hard to benefit everybody and these boy and man are just raping the hell out of her? even boys are recognized her contrivution and admire her??and they just being part of evil adult and being pround the drag her down to their level?this is why human as species deserve fxxking extinction.
No post nut if I can't understand the story
